bibl.title: Diodorus, Deuteronomy, and Egyptian Agriculture.
bibl.note: A parallel between Deut. 11, 10 a and Diodorus Siculus 1, 36, 4 shows continuity in Egyptian agricultural practice in irrigation [uses papyrological evidence]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Jaclyn Neel, Diodorus, Deuteronomy, and Egyptian Agriculture.
A parallel between Deut. 11, 10 a and Diodorus Siculus 1, 36, 4 shows continuity in Egyptian agricultural practice in irrigation [uses papyrological evidence]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
